description:
Norman is a fully optimized alternative keyboard layout to
      QWERTY for touch typing in English. It maintains keyboard shortcuts for
      the letters QWASZXCV and keeps 22/26 letters in the normal use pattern of
      their QWERTY finger, if not the original QWERTY location.
summary: Norman is a fully optimized alternative keyboard layout to QWERTY for touch typing in English.
author: David Norman
